VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Needs Analysis stage positioned above or below the Negotiation stage?
SRP.A: The Needs Analysis stage is positioned {above} the Negotiation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Proposal Sent?
VE.A: The value of stage Proposal Sent is {700}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Needs Analysis?
VE.A: The value of stage Needs Analysis is {985}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Needs Analysis, with a value of {985}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Contract Signed, with a value of {135}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {311} Clients from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 262? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Needs Analysis} stage has {985}, the {Proposal Sent} stage has {700}, the {Negotiation} stage has {389}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 262? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 262 and 842? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Proposal Sent} stage has {700}, the {Negotiation} stage has {389}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to {Proposal Sent} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Proposal Sent} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Proposal Sent} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Proposal Sent} and {Negotiation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.
